main.java.controller

Class DefaultState

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.controller.DefaultState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CalcState, DeliveryAddedState, DeliveryDeletedBeforeCalcState, DeliveryDeletedState, DeliveryLoadedState, DeliveryMovedState, DeliverySelectedBeforeCalcState, DeliverySelectedState, DurationChoiceBeforeCalcState, DurationChoiceState, InitialState, MapLoadedState, NodeSelectedBeforeCalcState, NodeSelectedState, PreviousDeliverySelectedState, SelectedPreviousMovedState

    public abstract class DefaultState
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
    The Class DefaultState. The default State, which implements every method of State.
